2021-03-01.name: Saezuru Tori wa Habatakanai: Don`t Stay Gold
2021-03-01.desc:
* Based on a BL drama manga series by Yoneda Kou.

Note: Bundled with a special edition of the manga's 7th volume.

2021-03-03.name: Alice in Deadly School
2021-03-03.desc:
The story begins with the peaceful daily life of schoolgirls—which suddenly breaks down when former schoolmates become zombies. The story follows the actions taken by the girls left behind on the school roof.

Source: ANN

Note: The first half aired on 04.01.2021 as part of a New Year's special alongside the first episode of Gekidol.

2021-03-05.name: Aria the Crepuscolo
2021-03-05.desc:
* Based on the fantasy slice of life manga series Aria by Amano Kozue.

The season is fall and the city of Neo-Venezia is covered in fallen leaves. Something is bothering Anya, who works at Orange Planet. Her senior colleagues Alice and Athena haven't seen each other due to their busy schedules, which is making Athena feel sad. But for some reason, Alice seems to be avoiding her altogether.
With her friends Ai and Azusa's help, Anya tries to find a definitive way for Alice and Athena to get together. But during this time, Anya learns of a situation that only she can see because of where she stands.

Source: Shochiku

2021-03-07.name: Oshiete Hokusai! The Animation
2021-03-07.desc:
* Based on a manga by Iwakiri Naoto.

Tenkorin Okakura is a high school slacker girl. While dreaming of a painter god, she makes a wish that her dreams can come true without practice or effort. The god Raijin hears her wish, summons real-life historical artists, and tells Tenkorin to have these artists teach her so that she can fulfill her dreams. Guided by their teachings, Tenkorin aims to become a real painter with a promising future.

Source: ANN

2021-03-08.name: Shin Evangelion Gekijouban:||
2021-03-08.desc: The fourth and final film in remake of Neon Genesis Evangelion anime series.

2021-03-12.name: Eiga Shimajirou: Shimajirou to Sora Tobu Fune

2021-03-18.name: B: The Beginning Succession
2021-03-18.desc:
Two men confronted their own past with great sacrifice. Maverick detective Keith Flick fought against his demons and finally exposed the dark secrets behind the Kingdom of Cremona. Mutant wunderkind Kokuu finally reunited with the most precious memory from his stolen childhood. Several months have passed since then, and the entire world seems to have forgotten the turmoil caused by those events. As Keith returns to the Royal Police to conduct his own investigation, Kokuu and Yuna try to enjoy an ordinary life in peace. But the consequences of the Jaula Blanca experiments are far from being extinct, as Kokuu soon discovers when his supposedly dead lab mate Kirisame suddenly shows up.

Source: Official website

2021-03-20.name: Eiga Healin` Good Precure: Yume no Machi de Kyun! Tto Go Go! Dai Henshin!!
Eiga Tropical-Rouge! Precure: Petit Tobikome! Collabo Dance Party!
2021-03-20.desc: Note: A short film screened alongside the film Healin' Good Precure.

2021-03-24.name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Over Dress
2021-03-24.desc:
Yu-yu is a boy living in Kanazawa, Kaga Province. He is 15 years old and in his third year of junior high school. He has the ability to sense the feelings of others, but he is troubled by the fact that he cannot say no when asked.

One day, Yu-yu could no longer stand going along with his sister's hobby, so he ran away from home. The one who saves him is Okura Megumi. Megumi invites Yu-yu to a nighttime amusement park called "Wonder Hill" where her friends hang out. At the amusement park, Yu-yu meets Megumi, Ishikame Zakusa, and Seto Tomari, members of "Team Blackout," a group that meets to play Vanguard every night.

Tonight, a serious fight for the team's flag will take place. Blackout's leader, Momoyama Danji, and the mysterious and powerful fighter, Ebata Touya. As Yu-yu stares at them, the card fight is soon eroded into a world of images.

This is how Yu-yu encounters Vanguard, a world he has never seen before, and is drawn in by its powerful allure- making new friends along the way.

Source: Bushiroad

Note: The first episode received a premiere on the official Vanguard YouTube channel on 24 March. The regular broadcast started on 3 April.

2021-03-25.name: Godzilla S.P
2021-03-25.desc: Note: Each episode was delivered on Netflix one week before its TV broadcast.

2021-03-27.name: Boku no Hero Academia (2021)
2021-03-27.desc: * Based on a super hero manga series written and illustrated by Horikoshi Kouhei.

2021-03-29.name: Koi to Yobu ni wa Kimochi Warui
2021-03-29.desc:
* Based on a love comedy manga by Mogusu.

The story follows the relationship between Amakusa Ryou, a sex-crazed but highly eligible bachelor with a wandering eye for women, and Arima Ichika, an ordinary otaku high school girl who is close friends with Ryou's little sister Rio. Ryou and Ichika meet by chance one day, but Ryou's direct approach — asking Ichika for a kiss and a date on the same day they meet — is a complete turn-off for Ichika. Despite Ichika's disgusted reaction (or arguably because of it), Ryou is convinced that she is the one.

Source: ANN
